Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities

Interface Capable

All Known Implementing Classes:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor, Blaze, Bubble, Bulbasaur, Candy, CapabilitySet, Charizard, Charmander, Charmeleon, Crater, Dirt, Door, Ember, enableSummon, Fire, FireSpin, Floor, Goh, Ground, Hay, Incubator, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item, Lava, NurseJoy, Player, PokeBall, PokeEgg, Pokefruit, Pokemon, Puddle, SpawningGround, Squirtle, Tree, VineWhip, Wall, Waterfall, WeaponItem
public interface Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
